channel.title: Quick and easy compile error
channel.description:
Can someone tell me how to fix this Wearing.java:134: illegal start of expression || ItemName2.startsWith("sword") ^ Wearing.java:143: not a statement || ItemName2.startsWith("halberd")) { ^ Wearing.java:143: ';' expected || ItemName2.startsWith("halberd")) { ^ Wearing.java:145: 'else' without 'if' } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Ahrims") || ItemName.startsWit ("Karil") || ItemName.startsWith("Torag") || ItemName.startsWith("Verac") || It mName.startsWith("Guthans") || ItemName.endsWith("Dharok")) { ^ 4 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .
i need help on where this problem is like (cleint.java ect and what to remove/edit

item.title: Quick and easy compile error

rova can you help me with my compile error? D:

item.title: Quick and easy compile error
item.dc:creator: @rova1 rova1
item.description:
@rova1 wrote:

open wearing.java and go to line 134, that’s where you have this:

|| ItemName2.startsWith("sword")

above(or in front of) that should be:

	[code=java]if (ItemName2.startsWith("dagger")[/code]

that should fix all errors you have here

Read full topic
